Reviews.Title: “This place really sucks, do not go here!”
Reviews.Author: jonevs
Reviews.Content: river view told guests pay money shown greeted strong musty smell overwhelming none windows view awful beds terrible wasnt comfortable own towel suitcase guess mistake plane white expensive mentioned staff couldnt care spa 10 euro consists 1 little steam 1 sauna massage pay 100 euros positive oh yeh close train station

Reviews.Title: “Great Location but some rooms can be noise”
Reviews.Author: taxchik
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel midnight found lobby closed fortunately restaurant below send bar door pick key set confusing instructions 3 4 locked doors facing street noise parking available park street towed ticketed news called desk morning accomodated quickly provided price quiet offered spa sent transfer baggage location river restaurant hotel 2 nights sat patio looking river drinks dinner station hotel convient nice quiet close reception 10p dont bring car

HotelInfo.Name: Riverside City Hotel & Spa
HotelInfo.Address: 106 Friedrichstrasse, 10117 Berlin, Germany (Formerly Hotel Artist Riverside)
